CQuartet Class Reference

An object to probe quartet, each quartet contains 4 cells each cell contains intensity, variance and number of pixels, store variance instead of stdev. More...

#include <DM.h>

Public Attributes

int pixels [NUMCELLS]
 four cells in the order of PM_A, MM_A, PM_B and MM_B /// number of pixels per cell
float intensity [NUMCELLS]
 intensities of each cell of the quartet
float variance [NUMCELLS]
 variances of each cell of the quartet

Detailed Description

An object to probe quartet, each quartet contains 4 cells each cell contains intensity, variance and number of pixels, store variance instead of stdev.
